verses.verse: Whosoever<WG3956> believeth<WG4100> that<WG3754> Jesus<WG2424> is<WG2076> the Christ<WG5547> is born<WG1080> of<WG1537> God<WG2316>: and<WG2532> every one<WG3956> that loveth<WG25> him that begat<WG1080> loveth<WG25> him also<WG2532> that is begotten<WG1080> of<WG1537> him<WG846>.

By<WG1722> this<WG5129> we know<WG1097> that<WG3754> we love<WG25> the children<WG5043> of God<WG2316>, when<WG3752> we love<WG25> God<WG2316>, and<WG2532> keep<WG5083> his<WG846> commandments<WG1785>.

For<WG1063> this<WG3778> is<WG2076> the love<WG26> of God<WG2316>, that<WG2443> we keep<WG5083> his<WG846> commandments<WG1785>: and<WG2532> his<WG846> commandments<WG1785> are<WG1526> not<WG3756> grievous<WG926>.

For<WG3754> whatsoever<WG3956> is born<WG1080> of<WG1537> God<WG2316> overcometh<WG3528> the world<WG2889>: and<WG2532> this<WG3778> is<WG2076> the victory<WG3529> that overcometh<WG3528> the world<WG2889>, even our<WG2257> faith<WG4102>.
Who<WG5101> is<WG2076> he that overcometh<WG3528> the world<WG2889>, but<WG1508> he that believeth<WG4100> that<WG3754> Jesus<WG2424> is<WG2076> the Son<WG5207> of God<WG2316>?

This<WG3778> is<WG2076> he that came<WG2064> by<WG1223> water<WG5204> and<WG2532> blood<WG129>, even Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>; not<WG3756> by<WG1722> water<WG5204> only<WG3440>, but<WG235> by<WG1722> water<WG5204> and<WG2532> blood<WG129>. And<WG2532> it is<WG2076> the Spirit<WG4151> that beareth witness<WG3140>, because<WG3754> the Spirit<WG4151> is<WG2076> truth<WG225>.

For<WG3754> there are<WG1526> three<WG5140> that bear record<WG3140> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772>, the Father<WG3962>, the Word<WG3056>, and<WG2532> the Holy<WG40> Ghost<WG4151>: and<WG2532> these<WG3778> three<WG5140> are<WG1526> one<WG1520>.

And<WG2532> there are<WG1526> three<WG5140> that bear witness<WG3140> in<WG1722> earth<WG1093>, the spirit<WG4151>, and<WG2532> the water<WG5204>, and<WG2532> the blood<WG129>: and<WG2532> these three<WG5140> agree<WG1526> in<WG1519> one<WG1520>.

If<WG1487> we receive<WG2983> the witness<WG3141> of men<WG444>, the witness<WG3141> of God<WG2316> is<WG2076> greater<WG3187>: for<WG3754> this<WG3778> is<WG2076> the witness<WG3141> of God<WG2316> which<WG3739> he hath testified<WG3140> of<WG4012> his<WG846> Son<WG5207>.

He that believeth<WG4100> on<WG1519> the Son<WG5207> of God<WG2316> hath<WG2192> the witness<WG3141> in<WG1722> himself<WG1438>: he that believeth<WG4100> not<WG3361> God<WG2316> hath made<WG4160> him<WG846> a liar<WG5583>; because<WG3754> he believeth<WG4100> not<WG3756><WG1519> the record<WG3141> that<WG3739> God<WG2316> gave<WG3140> of<WG4012> his<WG846> Son<WG5207>.

And<WG2532> this<WG3778> is<WG2076> the record<WG3141>, that<WG3754> God<WG2316> hath given<WG1325> to us<WG2254> eternal<WG166> life<WG2222>, and<WG2532> this<WG3778> life<WG2222> is<WG2076> in<WG1722> his<WG846> Son<WG5207>.
He that hath<WG2192> the Son<WG5207> hath<WG2192> life<WG2222>; and he that hath<WG2192> not<WG3361> the Son<WG5207> of God<WG2316> hath<WG2192> not<WG3756> life<WG2222>.

These things<WG5023> have I written<WG1125> unto you<WG5213> that believe<WG4100> on<WG1519> the name<WG3686> of the Son<WG5207> of God<WG2316>; that<WG2443> ye may know<WG1492> that ye<WG3754> have<WG2192> eternal<WG166> life<WG2222>, and<WG2532> that<WG2443> ye may believe<WG4100> on<WG1519> the name<WG3686> of the Son<WG5207> of God<WG2316>.

And<WG2532> this<WG3778> is<WG2076> the confidence<WG3954> that<WG3739> we have<WG2192> in<WG4314> him<WG846>, that<WG3754>, if<WG1437> we ask<WG154> any thing<WG5100> according<WG2596> to his<WG846> will<WG2307>, he heareth<WG191> us<WG2257>:

And<WG2532> if<WG1437> we know<WG1492> that<WG3754> he hear<WG191> us<WG2257>, whatsoever<WG3739><WG302> we ask<WG154>, we know<WG1492> that<WG3754> we have<WG2192> the petitions<WG155> that<WG3739> we desired<WG154> of<WG3844> him<WG846>.

If<WG1437> any man<WG5100> see<WG1492> his<WG846> brother<WG80> sin<WG264> a sin<WG266> which is not<WG3361> unto<WG4314> death<WG2288>, he shall ask<WG154>, and<WG2532> he shall give<WG1325> him<WG846> life<WG2222> for them that sin<WG264> not<WG3361> unto<WG4314> death<WG2288>. There is<WG2076> a sin<WG266> unto<WG4314> death<WG2288>: I do not<WG3756> say<WG3004> that<WG2443> he shall pray<WG2065> for<WG4012> it<WG1565>.
All<WG3956> unrighteousness<WG93> is<WG2076> sin<WG266>: and<WG2532> there is<WG2076> a sin<WG266> not<WG3756> unto<WG4314> death<WG2288>.

We know<WG1492> that<WG3754> whosoever<WG3956> is born<WG1080> of<WG1537> God<WG2316> sinneth<WG264> not<WG3756>; but<WG235> he that is begotten<WG1080> of<WG1537> God<WG2316> keepeth<WG5083> himself<WG1438>, and<WG2532> that wicked one<WG4190> toucheth<WG680> him<WG846> not<WG3756>.
And we know<WG1492> that<WG3754> we are<WG2070> of<WG1537> God<WG2316>, and<WG2532> the whole<WG3650> world<WG2889> lieth<WG2749> in<WG1722> wickedness<WG4190>.

And<WG1161> we know<WG1492> that<WG3754> the Son<WG5207> of God<WG2316> is come<WG2240>, and<WG2532> hath given<WG1325> us<WG2254> an understanding<WG1271>, that<WG2443> we may know<WG1097> him that is true<WG228>, and<WG2532> we are<WG2070> in<WG1722> him that is true<WG228>, even in<WG1722> his<WG846> Son<WG5207> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>. This<WG3778> is<WG2076> the true<WG228> God<WG2316>, and<WG2532> eternal<WG166> life<WG2222>.
Little children<WG5040>, keep<WG5442> yourselves<WG1438> from<WG575> idols<WG1497>. Amen<WG281>.
